title: Five Everyday AI Tools
intro: Click on any tool below to learn more about how AI powers it:

tools.name: Search Engines
tools.description: Google and Bing use AI to understand your queries and rank results intelligently.

tools.name: Voice Assistants
tools.description: Siri, Alexa, and Google Assistant use AI to understand speech and respond naturally.

tools.name: Recommendation Systems
tools.description: Netflix, Spotify, and Amazon use AI to suggest content you might like.

tools.name: Navigation Apps
tools.description: Google Maps and Waze use AI to find optimal routes and predict traffic.

tools.name: Photo Recognition
tools.description: Your phone's camera can identify objects, faces, and text using AI.
